title: Did the Second Lady (Karen Pines) work in a school that prevents teachers and students from lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender?
subtitle: The wife of Vice President Mike Pines resumed her work as an art school at the Christian School of Emmanuel in Northern Virginia in January 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In January 2019, Ms. II. Karen Pines began working as a school in a school banning teachers and students of lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender (LGBT) persons.
